parameters: Chimura's blacksmith is one of the finest I've ever come across. His blades are one of the main reasons I can explore Mt Coronet without fear!\n<Traveller>
Oh yes I heard he's off to Mt Coronet again.\n<Villager>
You can wait for him a while. He should be back pretty soon.\n<Villager>
Meanwhile you should pray as much as you can. Even the slightest blessings could deter Sin's wrath away from you!\n<Villager>
Hmm the security system of this shop doesn't seem too up to date. I could easily infiltrate it if...\n<???>
Get outta here this is private stuff!\n<???>
Quick! It appears as though Lady Gaea has unleashed her wrath once again!
We must make our way to the earthquake safety zone immediately!\n<Old Man>
So why are we brought here again?\n<\c[10]\n[1]\c[0]>
There's an earthquake going on, so this is where the villagers gather for safety. It's away from most buildings in the area.
It would seem that Lady Gaea has UNLEASHED her DEVASTATING wrath upon us once again!
The name's BORICE, glad to meet ya!
This Lady Gaea, who is she?\n<\c[22]\n[2]>
What?! You've never heard of the GRACEFUL Goddess of Earth?
Her's is the BEAUTIFUL temple we have not too far off through Mt Coronet.
If we do not pray to her and appease her for the month, she brings EARTHQUAKES to the village to show her RAGING anger.
Although I must say, there's something particularly odd about this MANLY earthquake.
The month isn't over yet,\! and the way the ground is shaking TREMENDOUSLY,\! it's is different than...\^
We pray everyday! We pray for God's blessings all the time!\n<Citizen>
(Why do I have this strange feeling I've fought this before?)\n<\c[10]\n[1]\c[0]>
I'm too terrified to even run right now!\n<Citizen>
No... one cannot outrun their misdeeds.
This is the end for us!
We probably deserve this! We were not loyal enough to the Gods!\n<Citizen>
Sin or not, I ain't letting this MONSTROSITY destroy my hometown!
Are you out of your mind?!\n<Priest>
I'll thank both of you later, if we make it out ALIVE!
Well that takes care of this bad boy
The Gods have shown mercy on us!
So this guy is the Shiki we're looking for?
Hmph, so much for over 130 years old.\n<\c[10]\n[1]\c[0]>
You three, that was awfully brave of you, picking a fight you were no match against.
Say, I don't recognise you two. So we finally have some visitors?
Um, yeah, we've come for your acquintance, Sir!\n<\c[22]\n[2]>
Sir? Please don't flatter me. Just call me Shiki, or even old man if you so prefer.
If you want to talk, this is no place to be doing so.
Hey \n[3]! Hit us up with some of that signature coffee of yours! We'll get some chatting over at my place!
And don't anyone dare say they prefer tea over some nice, hot coffee!
Burn them alive! They must be punished!
It is for the wickedness of these people that we suffer at the hands of Sin!
Jeez could this guy just shut up for once.\n<\c[10]\n[1]\c[0]>
Stop it dear Priest. I am here now, there is no need for anymore violence.
You may address me as Officer \c[14]Zephyrus\c[0] of The Order.
Officer Zephyrus, these are the people suspected,\.\. no found guilty of,\.\. the destruction of the Holy Temple of Gaea.
I demand they receive their just punishment!
Man you seem totally serious about this...\n<\c[10]\n[1]\c[0]>
You traitor! You have left God's judgement onto the hands of men!
Destroying a Sacred Temple? Why you lot seem to have committed quite the crime.
Wouldn't expect such actions from people of such a lowly village...
Who did you say is from a LOWLY village?!
Why this village hardly seems to be standing on it's own legs. You'd have to be really unfortunate to be bred amidst such filthy conditions.
Master, there you go openly expressing your controversial opinions again. If only you could sometimes keep your thoughts to yourself.
Number One, sometimes people choose to ignore the truth, it helps them avoid its pain.
But people must accept the true situation as it is. You can't run forever.
I'll show YOU who's from a LOWLY village!
You've got to stick to the plan!
Huh, didn't move an inch. Guess you've learnt to accept your place with the rest of these fodders.
Accepting the truth is truly a bliss.
Anyways, for your crimes, I shall have to take you to \c[1]Godfall Prison\c[0].
You should enjoy a good few years there. It's a far better place than this pile of rocks.
If that is their just punishment, it is one they deserve.
You seem pretty worked up on sending these people to prison. Must be really heartbroken that your temple got destroyed.
Anyways, \c[17]Number Two\c[0], put them on restraints and lead them down the mountains.
We shall send the report on the ship. Time to set sail for Godfall Prison.
